info.author: Fernando Crespo
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: Apache Software License
info.description:
================
Hover IP updater
================

Hover IP updater provides a cli (command line interface) to update a IP in
hover. Typical usage often looks like this::

    hover-updater USERNAME PASSWORD my.domain.com

Hover IP updater provides a cli (command line interface) to update a IP in hover. Typical usage often looks like this:
